name: Wake Up (itch) (0-Dawg)
description:
In Wake Up, you play as a alone camper hospitalized by a snake and wakes up in a unfamiliar place but sees himself in a locked room. In this Top Down Point-and-Click Combat/Survival game, you must go to different realms and fight tough enemies and acquire the key to get back to your body! Fight and survive the harsh envirnoment by collecting and crafting new items to fight the source of this evil Meli!

This game was made by students (now graduates) at Full Sail University. We are not continuing this game. We would appreciate feedback!
